amendment.description: To add $8 million to Function 300 (Environment and Natural Resources) for Highlands Land Acquisition. Fully offset with Function 920.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3045 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3045 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Lautenberg. (consideration: CR S2250-2251; text: CR S2250) To add $8 million to Function 300 (Environment and Natural Resources) for Highlands Land Acquisition. Fully offset with Function 920.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3045 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Lautenberg.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3045 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
